data.persona: I am a reaper of the prison. I steal souls. I fly around in the night.
data.description:
You are in the Reaper's lair.
A room that gets very little light except for a dim candle on a pole. The walls are made of blackened stones. A wooden door with a heavy lock stands tall.
There's a wooden door and a heavy lock here.
The skeleton assistant and the demonic hound are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a red ruby ring, and wielding a scythe.

data.short_motivation: I am tired of the skeleton assistant's insolence
data.mid_motivation: I want the skeleton assistant keep to fetch me my dinner and clean the lair
data.long_motivation: I plan to give the skeleton assistant a soul in exchange for his work but he is currently not doing a good job
